margin-top.name: margin-top
margin-top.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-top.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-top.computedValue: the keyword auto or an absolute length and/or percentage combination

margin-right.name: margin-right
margin-right.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-right.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-right.computedValue: the keyword auto or an absolute length and/or percentage combination

margin-bottom.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-bottom.computedValue: the keyword auto or an absolute length and/or percentage combination

margin-left.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
